PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03412018-03-26,  ISED,  ,  , 
ActTelecommunications Act
SubjectRegulations Repealing the Telecommunications Apparatus Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Repealing the TELECOMMUNICATIONS APPARATUS REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program) in order to eliminate the Regulations, which are now obsolete. This will help to reduce uncertainty regarding the approval process used by Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada for telecommunications apparatus being imported, distributed and sold in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0062 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment

This will help to reduce uncertainty regarding the approval process used by Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada for telecommunications apparatus being imported, distributed and sold in Canada.
